column2: "Oh my oh my oh my oh my?! Lisa thought she saw a rare sighting, and who is it but none other than Miss Xiera!"
"Is it alright for an Administrator such as yourself to be outside the Bridge?"
"Thank you! That's the correct reaction! You really get what this means for me, Miss Lisa!"
"Lisa hasn't the smallest teensy-tiny hint of a clue as to what are you being so emotional about, but okay."
"<%me> and Matoi just don't understand how big of a deal it is for me to go outside the Bridge!"
"As an ARKS Ship Administrator, you're always with them, so isn't it kind of obvious that it wouldn't feel that different?"
"Also, you didn't answer Lisa's question."
"Ah, um, let me explain. Right now, Xiao is handling things on the Bridge, so he gave me permission to do as I please."
"The fact that Xiao is personally handling things means that something big is happening, doesn't it?"
"Uh, n-no. That's not the case at all."
"Your body temperature just fluctuated, and you broke eye contact. You're not a very good liar, Miss Xiera."
"So hey, so hey, so hey, so hey, what kind of enemy is it? Where are the bad guys?!"
"If Xiao needs to personally take over all of the calculations, wouldn't that mean it's an extremely powerful opponent?"
"N-no, I don't know what you're..."
"Hehehehe! You're veeery easy to read."
"Is the enemy a Darker this time?! A new species like the ones on Earth?! Or perhaps could it be something... else?"
"Oh, oh, wait, it wouldn't have anything to do with that strong inner presence emanating from within you, would it?!"
"Come to think of it, there was that emergency medical check not too long ago... right?"
"P-Please stop trying to get me to spill the beans!"
"<%me>, help me out here!"
"Alright, that's enough, Lisa."
"You're on your own here, Xiera."
"Hum. Well, if it's coming from you, then Lisa will leave it at that."
"You don't have to look so uncomfortable. Lisa was able to glean enough information, so she'll let it go."
"Lisa won't tell you not to have your secrets, but she certainly doesn't want you to hide any fun topics from her, okay?"
"In particular, that power Lisa can sense from within you. That seems reeeally fun, you know? Lisa's never sensed anything like it before."
"Lisa wants you to teach her about more and more fun things like that, you know?"
"Actually, it might not be all that fun of a conversation..."
"Well, it doesn't seem like something that can be taken care of overnight, so it's fine."
"But please do let Lisa know when things are about to get fun, okay? Make sure that you do that, you know? Hehehehehe."
"...I'm in an ARKS Ship, but I kind of felt like my life was in danger for a moment there."
"Interacting with people in person is a lot more intense than speaking to them over the comms, isn't it?"
